edu.frontrange.csc240.a6

Class Student

  • Object
    • edu.frontrange.csc240.a6.Student

  • public class Student
extends Object
    This class models students in a Community College. Each instance keeps certain details of one student. The details include the student ID, given and family name, date-of-birth, and the target degree for the student.
    Version:
    2.5, 2016-08-22, CSC-240 Assignment 6, per the Assignment Instructions
    Author:
    Dr. Bruce K. Haddon, Instructor

      Modifier and Type Field and Description

      The student's date of birth (DOB), or null.

      The number of Student objects currently in memory.

      Default name and ID value

      String to use if the first name is not validly set.
      private static String INVALID_LAST_NAME
      String to use if the last name is not validly set.
      private String lastName
      The student's family name.
      private static String LINE_SEPARATOR
      The system-specific character sequence used to separate lines.
      private static int S_POSITION
      Position in the ID where the letter S will be found.
      private String studentID
      Student ID for this student.
      private Degree targetDegree
      The student's current objective degree, or null.

        Constant across all Student instances, for the length of the student ID. This value must be 1 or greater.

      • count

        private static int count
        The number of Student objects currently in memory. Static variable incremented by each use of a constructor, decremented when any instance is finalized.

      • birthDate

        private Date birthDate
        The student's date of birth (DOB), or null.

      • firstName

        private String firstName
        The student's given name.

      • lastName

        private String lastName
        The student's family name.

      • studentID

        private String studentID
        Student ID for this student. The length must be ID_LENGTH.

      • targetDegree

        private Degree targetDegree
        The student's current objective degree, or null.

        lastName - the student's family name.

        lastName - the student's family name.
        birthDate - the student's date-of-birth (precondition: not null)

        lastName - the student's family name.
        birthDate - the student's date-of-birth (precondition: not null)
        targetDegree - the student's degree program (precondition: not null)

      • getBirthDate

        Get the Student's date-of-birth.
        Returns:
        student's date-of-birth (null if not supplied)

      • setBirthDate

        Set the birth date of the Student.
        Parameters:
        birthDate - the birth date of the Student (precondition: not null)

      • getDegree

        public Degree getDegree()
        Get the target degree towards which the Student is working.
        Returns:
        student's currently targeted degree (null if not supplied)

      • setDegree

        public final void setDegree(Degree targetDegree)
        Set the target degree towards which this student is working.
        Parameters:
        targetDegree - the target degree (precondition: not null)

      • getDetails

        public String getDetails()
        Create a String detailing the Student's name, student ID, date of birth, and the degree towards which the Student is working. Each item is separated from the next by the system designated line.separator.
        Returns:
        all details of student (name, ID, DOB, and degree).

      • getFirstName

        public String getFirstName()
        Get the Student's first (given) name.
        Returns:
        student's given name (null if no valid name supplied)

      • setFirstName

        public void setFirstName(String firstName)
        Set the first (given) name of the Student.
        Parameters:
        firstName - the given name of the Student

      • getFullName

        public String getFullName()
        Get the full name of the student. If parts of the name have not been validly supplied, this will be noted in the returned String.
        Returns:
        full name (given name followed by family name).

      • getLastName

        public String getLastName()
        Get the Student's last (family) name.
        Returns:
        student's family name (null if no valid name supplied)

      • setLastName

        public void setLastName(String lastName)
        Set the last (family) name of the Student.
        Parameters:
        lastName - the family name of the Student

      • getStudentID

        public String getStudentID()
        Get the student ID of the Student.
        Returns:
        student ID (S and eight digits).

      • setStudentID

        public void setStudentID(String studentID)
        Set the studentID for this student.
        Parameters:
        studentID - the student ID (must be of format Snnnnnnnn)

      • isValidFirstName

        private static boolean isValidFirstName(String name)
        Validate a first name. The name must not be null or empty.
        Parameters:
        name - the name to validate
        Returns:
        true if the name if valid

      • isValidLastName

        private static boolean isValidLastName(String name)
        Validate a last name. The name must not be null or empty.
        Parameters:
        name - the name to validate
        Returns:
        true if the name if valid

      • isValidStudentID

        private static boolean isValidStudentID(String studentID)
        Validate a student ID. It must consist of the letter 'S' followed by exactly the number of digits to make up the total length.
        Parameters:
        studentID - the student ID to validate
        Returns:
        true if the student ID is valid
